item.description: 1.62.0 (2022-06-30) # Language # Stabilize #[derive(Default)] on enums with a #[default] variant Stop validating some checks in dead code after functions with uninhabited return types Fix constants not getting dropped if part of a diverging expression Support unit struct/enum variant in destructuring assignment Remove mutable_borrow_reservation_conflict lint and allow the code pattern Compiler # linker: Stop using whole-archive on dependencies of dylibs Make unaligned_references lint deny-by-default This lint is also a future compatibility lint, and is expected to eventually become a hard error.

1.63.0 (Unreleased) # Remove migrate borrowck mode Stabilize the bundle native library modifier Stabilize $$ in Rust 1.63.0 Make write/print macros eagerly drop temporaries Stabilize Ipv6Addr::to_ipv4_mapped Stabilize const_intrinsic_copy Stabilize {slice,array}::from_ref Stabilize checked slice->str conversion functions Stabilize box_into_pin Stabilize toowned_clone_into Stabilize Path::try_exists() and improve doc Stabilize scoped threads.
